body:
Hello,

Recently, many players and staff have been seen breaking rules on scrim servers. These servers are a part of Avicus, and the same rules will be enforced as on regular servers. If you are a staff member and are seen breaking rules on a scrim server, the result will be a demotion or warning. Players will receive the same punishments written in the guidelines. That's all, thanks!
body_tagged:

Players will receive the same punishments written in the guidelines. That's all, thanks!
title: Scrim Servers
